response.answer_text: Most importantly from class 9th. The content given in the class 9th and class 10th NCERT is all repeated in class 11th and 12th NCERT in some more details. So if you are focusing from 9th on NCERT then it will provide you great depth of understanding of subject and strengthen your concepts. Overall this become significant for cracking NEET exam.
Your Basics must be clear. So read 9th and 10th class NCERT books too. Otherwise questions in the exam will be asked from 11th & 12th class books only. Hope,you get the answer.
NEET syllabus is of only 11th and 12th class. So, NCERT books of 11th and 12th should be referred. Hope this helps. Thanks.
